turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Can you help me place a pickup order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: place pick up order with bella luna, ok sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many pizza would you like to order today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm looking at four large with a gluten-free crust, two of them Veggie Lovers and the other two with broccoli.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 veggie lovers and 2 broccoli topping is that right, total 4 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's exactly it. And they all need to be glue and free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and they all need to be gluten free crust is that your final order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please go ahead and place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok with 4 large pizza your order comes to 90 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza will be read to pick up in 30 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
